verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I WON'T BE SATISFIED newline I WON'T B FOUND ALRIGHT newline TILL I FIND newline WHO YOU ARE

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I CLIMB EVERY MOUNTAIN newline I TRAVELEDTHE DEEPEST VALLEY newline TO FIND newline WHO YOU ARE

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: YOU, YOU CAUSE THE LAME TO WALK newline YOU OPEN LIPS TO TALK newline YOU'RE EVERYTHING newline AND THAT IS WHO YOU ARE

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: YOU, YOU CALM THE STORM AT NIGHT newline YOU TURN THE DARK TO LIGHT newline YOU'RE EVERYTHING newline AND THAT IS WHO YOU ARE

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: MY SAVIOR, MY HEALER, REDEEMER newline THAT IS WHO YOU ARE newline CREATOR, MY MAKER, MY FATHER newline THAT IS WHO YOU ARE
